metadata.name: H2WW AI Companion Interface Design

metadata.concept: Progressive trust building through conversational AI interface

trustBuilding.transparency: AI reasoning is always visible and explainable
trustBuilding.progressiveDisclosure: Features unlock as user confidence grows
trustBuilding.humanControl: User always maintains control over AI interactions
trustBuilding.safetyFirst: Clear boundaries and safe practice guidance

learningOptimization.contextualGuidance: Help appears when and where needed
learningOptimization.personalizedExperience: Interface adapts to user skill level

geometricMetaphors.circle: Continuous learning journey, AI companion presence

children.content: Progressive trust building through conversational AI ‚Ä¢ User experience first approach
I'm your AI learning companion. I'll guide you step-by-step from AI beginner to confident user. Ready to start your journey?

‚Ä¢ All data stays private
‚Ä¢ You control AI interactions
‚Ä¢ Learn at your own pace
Great progress! You've mastered prompt basics. Ready to learn about context windows?
Impressive! You're now an AI power user. Ready to mentor others or explore cutting-edge techniques?
Great question! Let me explain how ChatGPT context windows work...
How do I make my ChatGPT prompts more effective?
I can guide you through writing effective prompts step-by-step. Would you like to try the interactive prompt builder?
